title: Admin Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that an admin user can successfully log in with correct email and password using Firebase authentication and receives a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page
Enter valid admin email
Enter correct password
Click the login button
Verify successful login and reception of JWT token
Verify role-based access control grants admin privileges

title: Moderator Login Restriction for User Management
description: Verify that a user with the MODERATOR role cannot access user creation or deletion functions and receives appropriate access denied messages.

steps.description: Login as a MODERATOR user
Navigate to user management interface
Attempt to create or delete a user account
Verify access denied or UI elements disabled

title: Hierarchical Category Creation with Localization
description: Verify that an admin can create hierarchical categories with correct parent-child structure and localized names for English, Arabic (RTL), and Dutch locales.

steps.description: Navigate to category management page
Create a top-level category with localized names in en, ar, nl
Verify category is created with correct localized names
Create a child category under the top-level category with localized names
Verify child category hierarchy and localization

title: Prevent Deletion of Category Assigned to Content
description: Verify that the system prevents deletion of categories currently assigned to any approved content and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Identify category assigned to approved channel or playlist
Attempt to delete the category
Verify deletion is blocked with a meaningful message

title: YouTube Search Returns Mixed Content Types with Caching
description: Verify that searching YouTube returns channels, playlists, and videos in a blended result within 2 seconds, using proper caching and pagination.

steps.description: Navigate to content search interface
Search for keyword 'Islamic education'
Verify response contains mixed content types: channels, playlists, and videos
Verify search completes in less than 2 seconds
Execute the same search again and verify that cached results are returned
Validate pagination works correctly and loads subsequent pages

title: Content Addition Initiates Add for Approval Status
description: Verify that adding YouTube content begins the approval workflow with status 'Add for Approval'.

steps.description: From search results, select a channel for addition
Add the channel to approval queue with category assignment and notes
Verify item status is 'Add for Approval' and listed in approval queue

title: Moderator Approves Content with Category Assignment and Notes
description: Verify that a moderator can review pending content, assign categories, add notes, and approve content, moving it to 'Approved' state with audit logging.

steps.description: Login as a moderator
Open the pending approvals queue
Select a channel or playlist to review
Assign one or more categories
Add approval notes
Approve the content
Verify content status changes to 'Approved'
Verify audit log entry created with moderator identity, action, timestamp, and notes

title: Moderator Rejects Content with Reason and Audit Trail
description: Verify that rejecting content records the rejection reason, transitions item state to 'Rejected', and audit logs are created accordingly.

steps.description: Login as a moderator
Access pending approvals
Select an item to reject
Provide a mandatory rejection reason
Confirm rejection
Verify status updates to 'Rejected'
Verify rejection reason is stored
Verify audit log entry is created

title: Exclude Specific Video from Approved Channel
description: Verify that a moderator/admin can exclude a specific video from an approved channel, and the exclusion prevents display in the public API and Android app.

steps.description: Navigate to exclusions workspace for an approved channel
Exclude a video by providing video ID and reason
Verify video no longer appears in content API responses for end users
Verify video is not visible or playable in the Android app

title: Public API Serves Approved, Non-Excluded Content with Localization
description: Verify that the public content API only returns approved content filtered for exclusions and respects the Accept-Language header for English, Arabic, and Dutch.

steps.description: Call public content API with no Accept-Language header
Verify only approved, non-excluded content is returned in English
Call API with Accept-Language: ar
Verify content names and descriptions are in Arabic (RTL support)
Call API with Accept-Language: nl
Verify content names and descriptions are in Dutch
Verify excluded videos and playlists do not appear

title: Android App Cold Start and Onboarding with Language Selection
description: Verify that the native Android app cold starts in under 2.5 seconds and completes onboarding including language selection (English, Arabic RTL, Dutch) correctly with locale persistence.

steps.description: Launch fresh install of the Android app
Verify app cold start completes within 2.5 seconds
Complete onboarding language selection choosing Arabic
Verify UI switches to RTL layout
Restart app
Verify previously selected language and locale persist

title: Android App Video Playback Quality Selection and PiP Mode
description: Verify video player supports quality selection, Picture-in-Picture mode, and audio-only playback for halal videos.

steps.description: Play approved video in the Android app
Select different video quality levels
Verify video quality changes accordingly without playback issues
Activate PiP mode
Verify video continues playing in a floating window
Switch to audio-only playback mode
Verify only audio plays and video is hidden

title: Offline Playlist Download with EULA Acceptance and Quota Enforcement
description: Verify users can download a playlist offline after accepting EULA and passing storage quota check; videos show accurate download progress and playback offline.

steps.description: Select a playlist for offline download
Accept the EULA presented
Verify device storage is sufficient for download
Initiate playlist download
Verify download progress indicators show accurate progress per video
Play downloaded videos offline
Verify smooth playback without network connection

title: Audit Logging Captures All Admin Actions with Query and Pagination
description: Verify that all administrative actions including approve, reject, create, update, and delete are logged with actor, timestamp, IP, and notes; logs can be queried and paginated.

steps.description: Perform various admin actions: create user, approve content, reject content
Access audit log view
Filter audit logs by action type and actor
Navigate through paginated audit logs
Verify each log entry contains correct actor, action type, timestamp, IP address and notes
Verify filtering and pagination work correctly and efficiently

title: Bulk Import Validation for Duplicate YouTube IDs and Metadata Completeness
description: Verify bulk import validation detects duplicate YouTube IDs across channels, playlists, videos and validates required metadata for both simple and full formats with detailed feedback.

steps.description: Prepare bulk import JSON with duplicate and incomplete entries
Perform bulk import validation dry-run
Verify duplicate ID detection and metadata validation errors are reported with details
Correct errors and retry validation
Verify validation passes for correct entries

title: User Interface Supports English, Arabic (RTL), and Dutch with Correct Numeric/Date Formats
description: Verify all UI components display correctly in English, Arabic (including RTL layout), and Dutch with proper numeric and date formatting consistent with locale standards.

steps.description: Switch UI language to English
Verify all text elements, numbers, and dates display properly
Switch UI language to Arabic
Verify UI layout switches to RTL and text is correctly displayed
Switch UI language to Dutch
Verify Dutch translations and locale-specific formats

title: Admin Dashboard Shows Accurate Metrics and Refreshes Every 60 Seconds
description: Verify the admin dashboard displays real-time metrics for total categories, channels, playlists, videos, pending approvals, and active moderators and auto-refreshes metrics every 60 seconds without UI glitches.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to dashboard
Verify displayed metrics for totals and pending items are accurate based on backend data
Wait for 60 seconds or trigger dashboard refresh
Verify metrics update reflects changes in data without UI issues

title: Video Metadata Validation Detects Invalid or Unavailable Videos
description: Verify that fetching YouTube video metadata via API returns correct details and flags unavailable or invalid videos preventing their addition to the system.

steps.description: Request video details for a valid YouTube ID
Verify metadata includes title, description, thumbnail and is valid
Request video details for a deleted or private YouTube ID
Verify error or unavailability is reported and user is prevented from adding the video

title: User Creation by ADMIN with Role Enforcement and Status Management
description: Verify that only users with ADMIN role can create, edit, or delete user accounts, assign roles (ADMIN or MODERATOR), and change user statuses; moderators cannot perform these actions.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN user
Create a new user with role MODERATOR
Verify user creation success and role assignment
Login as MODERATOR user and attempt to create or delete users
Verify access denied or disabled UI controls

title: Bulk Export in Simple and Full Metadata Formats
description: Verify bulk export of channels in both simple (ID only) and full metadata formats returns correctly structured JSON files without data loss.

steps.description: Request bulk export of channels with 'simple' format
Verify exported file contains only channel IDs
Request bulk export of channels with 'full' format
Verify exported file contains complete metadata including names, descriptions, localized values
